verses.name: John 6:57
verses.text: As the living Father hath sent me, and I live by the Father: so he that eateth me, even he shall live by me.

verses.name: John 6:58
verses.text: This is that bread which came down from heaven: not as your fathers did eat manna, and are dead: he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever.

verses.name: John 6:59
verses.text: These things said he in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.

verses.name: John 6:60
verses.text: Many therefore of his disciples, when they had heard this, said, This is an hard saying; who can hear it?
